scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../Part\ 2\ -\ Communicating\ with\ server/2.6-2.17\ -\ Phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../Part\ 3\ -\ Programming\ a\ server\ with\ NodeJS\ and\ Express/3.13-3.22\ Phonebook\ backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
